title: Leaverbuster is an Unfair tool
body:
Leaverbuster is an unfair tool IMHO. Here's my experience:

Over the last 2 days I was marked as "leaver" just because my pc (or the server) crashed after an alt+tab operation. I couldn't even re-log in as fast as necessary to join the game, because the match got already closed.
This kind of process happened a lot of times during last 2 seasons, so that now I am flagged with leaverbuster after the slightest sign of leave from my side. No matter how good I try to behave, the crash is always around the corner and I am going to get marked as "leaver" sooner or later.
As a result, I am basically unable to regain my originary status, because a single crash of server or of my pc makes my status drop again to Leaverbuster with a 20 minutes queue. And no, I don't have problems with WIFI settings or hardware.

In my opinion, probably applied to my case, this doesn't represent a corrective tool, but just an obstacle. 
I'm talking to you Riot: if it wasn't for all the money I spent on skins so far, I would 100% had shut down my account one season ago.

Sincerely,
- a very disappointed customer

replies.body: I know you're having issues with your PC, but [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) treats everyone equally regardless of intent.  Other players are also caused a negative experience for being down a player.  I highly recommend not queuing up for matches while this gets worked on, and stick to customs to troubleshoot.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to get some logs and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help figure out what's going on.

Apolae, I'm sorry but I agree with the Devs here. There's nothing worse than being down a man; even a feeder might change his tune, but not having a 5th is just downright intolerable.

I appreciate how leaver buster works.

You yourself admit this has happened more than once to you. It's not a single event that's flagging you.
system sucks the worst ever created
